column5: Hey all, Heading up to PIne Vista resort in a couple of weeks for some walley (maybe a muskie). Really looking forward to it as I've never been fall walleye fishing or to Stony before(heard it's awesome).We reserved the bassboat at the resort. Anyone been up there before? How's the resort and cottages? Is the fishing good at that area of the lake?
real nice place man! you will get into some fish as well.. if you need any tips pm me

Good friends of mine have been renting there for a few years and I went up for a day this year with them. We nailed bass all day and even hit a surprise musky while bass fishing. The lake is full of ski's and bass, and walleye too if you know where to look. good luck!
